channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2024021589
item.description:
Report X-2024021589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024021589: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN HONOLULU, HAWAII, CONTENTS OF ONE BLACK HEAVY PLASTIC BAG WAS INSPECTED. ONE INNER BOX WITH A GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING WAS FOUND INSIDE THE BAG. INSPECTION OF THIS INNER BOX REVEALED TWO AEROSOL CANS OF CVS SPORT 50 CLEAR SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST BAG CONTAINING THE LTD QTY MARKED BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. X-2024021906: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN HONOLULU, HAWAII, CONTENTS OF ONE BLACK HEAVY PLASTIC BAG OFFERED AIR SERVICE TO UPS WERE INSPECTED. ONE INNER BOX WITH A GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING WAS FOUND INSIDE THE BAG. INSPECTION OF THIS INNER BOX REVEALED TWO BIOFREEZE GEL PAIN RELIEVERS AND ONE BIOFREEZE ROLL ON TOPICAL PAIN RELIEVER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST BAG CONTAINING THE LTD QTY MARKED BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
